item.title: Two Point Museum
item.description:
Title: Two Point Museum
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Two Point Studios
Publisher: SEGA
Franchise: Two Point
Release Date: Mar 4, 2025




About This Game



Two Point Museum Includes:

  • Design, manage and develop incredible museums

  • 5 unique main museum locations to Two Point County:

- Prehistory - Memento Mile

- Aquarium - Passwater Cove

- Supernatural - Wailon Lodge

- Science - Bungle Wasteland

- Space - Pebberley Heights

  • 3 Pop up museums with set tasks and challenges

  • Sandbox mode to build your very own MEGA MUSEUMS!

  • 6 main exhibit types and 30+ sub categories of exhibits

  • You’ll adventure through 5 different expedition maps with 100+ unique points of interest

  • 200+ unique exhibits to uncover and fill your sticker book

  • 350+ decorative items to make your museum uniquely you

  • 18 guest types to meet and cater for …. including those meddling kids

  • Unlock and manage all the museums in Two Point County!

As fledgling curators, you have the task of designing and refining your very own museums to create the ultimate guest experience. Coordinate Experts on far-flung expeditions to discover new Exhibits, generating Buzz to entice droves of knowledge-hungry guests who will expect top info-tainment if they’re to leave impressed. This is all while you keep your Exhibits safe, rooms clean, staff happy… and children off the dinosaur bones.

As Curator, the design and management of your expanding museum is in your hands! Send your team of partially trained Experts on Expeditions in search of rare and mostly well-preserved artefacts. When (and hopefully not if) your Experts return from their adventure, proudly display their fantastic finds in your museum.

You’ll unlock new locations as you decide where the next adventure takes you.

Your work doesn’t end there; Exhibit maintenance is crucial. While some Experts are gallivanting across Two Point County and beyond, you’re in charge of managing staff back home to ensure Exhibits and the museum stay in tip-top condition. If taking care of the carnivorous Chomper isn’t enough, there are also meddling thieves to watch out for. Thieves, and more frequently, children, are known for touching and grubbing up the displays, so make sure enough security is guarding your prized collection!

Get creative to design your museum layout your way! You have decorative freedom, so design thematic areas to guide your guests’ visit. Splash paint and lay carpet as you lovingly arrange each prehistoric fern, potentially melting iceman, and dinosaur remains wherever you see fit.

Once you’ve created the perfect atmosphere, arrange guided tours with custom routes led by a charismatic Expert. Tours are a fantastic way to enrich your guests' experience. To keep guests enthused, showcase Exhibits with the highest Buzz - those that are top quality, provide ample info and beautiful decorations are likely to attract the most donations!

Guests know best! The different types of guests who will frequent your museum may have different interests, but they do have some things in common… they expect the place to be kept clean, have plenty of refreshments, ample toilets, and a gift shop filled with goodies. And, of course, they need to be dazzled with knowledge of your Exhibits, which are kept well-maintained…

Two Point County will bring a variety of guests to your museum, and they all hope to discover their new favourite Exhibit… From dino fanatics and botany buffs to haunted horror seekers, you’ll need to cater to their personal preferences to meet their needs. By exceeding their expectations, you can keep them engaged, leading to longer visits, increased donations, and glowing reviews!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

Linux

item.title: Everhood 2
item.description:
Title: Everhood 2
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: Chris Nordgren , Jordi Roca
Publisher: Foreign Gnomes
Franchise: Foreign Gnomes
Release Date: Mar 4, 2025




About This Game

Enter the world of Everhood

Discover the color of your soul and what lies beyond the river of death in a strange land. Accompany a mysterious celestial Raven who has deemed you worthy of slaying the Mind Dragon.

Features

  • Master the music-based battles with over 100 songs!

  • Voyage through a transcendental journey across 10-12 hours

  • Enter a wild universe with mind-bending visuals

  • Conquer the unconquerable

  • Custom World & Battle Editor Support

  • Make funny friends!

WARNING: The game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy, those can be disabled in the Accessibility Menu included in the game.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10,11
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 128 MB
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10,11
    • Processor: 2GHz+
    • Graphics: 512MB

item.title: PowerWash Simulator – Wallace & Gromit Special Pack
item.description:
Title: PowerWash Simulator – Wallace & Gromit Special Pack
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: FuturLab
Publisher: Square Enix
Release Date: Mar 4, 2025




About This Content

Good grief, what’s all this mess? Things have gone a bit pear-shaped over at 62 West Wallaby Street following a mechanical malfunction, the biggest disaster since the cracker catastrophe of ’89! Help Wallace and Gromit with the most charming clean up yet and you might even earn yourself a “well done, lad!”

You’ll be piloting Wallace’s latest clever contraption, the WASH LAD. Expertly engineered with only the best technology to hose down dirt from all the nooks, cranny’s, bits and bobs in sight - just add elbow grease!

Wash and explore the home of the iconic British duo, hosing down every infamous invention from the Techno Trousers to the Soccomatic ‘til there’s no dirt left, not a bit in the house. Just be sure not to dampen the crackers.

Begin this cracking cleaning adventure in Wallace and Gromit’s humble home, nestled in the North English suburbs and finish the spruce up with a trip among the stars – the sky really is the limit in this Special Pack, eh?

Fire up WASH LAD and prepare to commence Project Scrub Down in the following locations:

  • Wallace & Gromit's Dining Room & Kitchen

  • Wallace & Gromit’s House

  • The Knit-O-Matic

  • Wallace & Gromit’s Vehicles

  • The Moon Rocket

    Recommended:

item.title: Knights in Tight Spaces
item.description:
Title: Knights in Tight Spaces
Genre: Action , Strategy
Developer: Ground Shatter
Publisher: Raw Fury
Franchise: Raw Fury Games
Release Date: Mar 4, 2025




About This Game



Knights in Tight Spaces is a turn-based tactical game in the same universe as Fights in Tight Spaces. It is a standalone title that sends us back to medieval times, building on the much-loved gameplay in new and dynamic ways.



Knights in Tight Spaces' battles have a striking and stylish appearance, with strong action-movie visual effects and animations. Vibe with the electronic soundtrack and battle your way through action-packed levels that will put your strategic thinking to the test.



Winning is not just a matter of playing your best hand, but also learning how to master your surroundings. Recruit new characters and assemble your party carefully: Deck synergies and team-up moves will be key to keep your tactical advantage. But remember, always be careful with who you choose and who you reject in your team! Friend or foe, sometimes they are just two sides of the same coin…



With 300 cards, different classes and gear to equip, and the upgrading system, Knights in Tight Spaces offers you countless hours of deckbuilding fun. If you’re up for a challenge, climb the Daily Play leaderboard or prove your toughness in the Endless mode.





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Knight In Tight Spaces provide a fantasy based / comic violence with added Gore and blood effects. Main character is fighting many human-like creatures with a goal of killing them to progress further.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 CPU @ 2.80GHz/AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalents
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 3GB VRAM/AMD Radeon RX 560 3GB VRAM or equivalents
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 3 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 8-Core/Intel Core i5-4670K CPU @ 3.40GHz or equivalents
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB VRAM/Radeon RX 480 Graphics 6GB VRAM or equivalents
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 3 GB available space

item.title: HENPRI
item.description:
Title: HENPRI
Genre: Adventure , Casual
Developer: Qruppo
Publisher: Shiravune
Franchise: Shiravune
Release Date: Mar 3, 2025




About This Game

STORY


Tulip Prison—a special penitentiary filled with criminals from all over Japan who have been deemed too far gone to rehabilitate. As the “phantom precinct” of the justice system, its facilities occupy an inescapable island that stands alone on the open sea.

Shuichiro Minato—a young man who lives in Tokyo. Amid the Christmas lighting one beautiful winter night, he was arrested as a public nuisance.

Shuichiro defended himself in court, describing his acts as self-expression— art —but no one could understand him. He was sentenced to ten years of penal servitude for being a pest and resisting arrest. What's more, he was deemed too far gone to rehabilitate... and thrown into Tulip Prison. In a modern-day dungeon with monsters in human skin around every corner, can one brave annoyance survive?

Whatever the future holds, one thing is for sure: This prison ain't no paradise.

CHARACTER


Prisoner #0545: HANAMARU (Voice: Haru Amachi)
A self-possessed woman who treats Shuichiro kindly and becomes the first person he opens up to. She offers him generous advice on the best ways to survive in the prison’s harsh environment. Her nickname is “Cultmaster.”
“My little sister and I were just pulling a prank...”


Prisoner #0721: KUREBAYASHI (Voice: Hajime Fumizuki)
On the outside, she earned the nickname “Drone Girl” for her dealings with secret recordings—in Tulip Prison, she’s just another prisoner. She prefers to be alone and makes sure she’ll get to stay that way by driving people away with her sharp-tongued hostility.
“I do not like owing people favors. It would be no exaggeration to say I actually hate it.”



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i-series 4000 or higher
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i-series 6000 or higher
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1660ti
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
